articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Here
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Here
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party arrived here by air on Friday.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Lays Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Lays Floral Basket before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Gift to Kim Jong Un from IIJI Secretary General
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a gift from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Secretary General Kenichi Ogami handed them to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, on Friday.

articles.title: Our Socialism Centered on Masses Shall Not Perish: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Our Socialism Centered on Masses Shall Not Perish: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article says that Korean-style socialism is making a long drive despite many changes in the environment of the times and the conditions of revolutionary struggle. It goes on:
					 Seeing vibrant Korean-style socialism demonstrating the invincible might under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, along the road indicated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the army and people of the DPRK are convinced of the bright prospect of socialism of Juche.
					
					 The DPRK is displaying the dignity as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and the might as a matchless military power. This is the precious fruition of its firm independent principle.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is dynamically advancing along the road of independence under the guidance of Kim Jong Un who is leading the revolution and construction the same way as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did, possessed of same grit and spirit with them.
					
					 The single-minded unity in the DPRK is developing into purer and more solid one in the present times led by Kim Jong Un. The leader leads service personnel and people to perform heroic feats, believing in them. All the service personnel and people are devotedly defending the leader politically and ideologically by becoming a thousand-fold fortress.
					
					 The relations between the Supreme Commander and soldiers are becoming the genuine relations of revolutionary comrades and comrades-in-arms, and all the service personnel and people are thoroughly implementing with loyalty the idea and intention of the leader. This is the true picture of the single-minded unity in the DPRK.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all service personnel and people to glorify this year as a year of grandiose struggle, a year of sea changes, in which they usher in a golden age of Songun Korea, and the new centenary of Juche as annuals of victory of Korean-style socialism, true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Cedi Publishing House of the DR Congo.
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the publishing house on Dec. 27 last year.
					
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), tells about the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by noble patriotism and the love for the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Pakistani Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Pakistani Figure
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Shahida Wijarat, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, issued a statement on Dec. 29 last year on the occasion of the second anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA marked a significant occasion which helped socialism in the DPRK advance along the road of victory without the slightest vacillation despite all sorts of pressures and offensives of the imperialists by providing a sure guarantee for further strengthening the KPA.
					
					 It was also an event of historic significance which made it possible to develop the DPRK into the eternal country of President Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il and glorify socialism centered on the popular masses by fully demonstrating the dignity and might of Songun Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, possessed of extraordinary political and military wisdom and outstanding leadership ability, is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the heart of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea, symbol of the unity and might and powerful pillar of independence, peace and justice.
					
					 The future of Korea is rosy as it is under his leadership and the dawn of national reunification is sure to break.

articles.title: Socialist Constitution of DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Socialist Constitution of DPRK Introduced by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website an article titled "Socialist Constitution of the DPRK" on December 27, 2013.
					 The article said as follows:
					
					 The DPRK significantly marks the Constitution Day every year.
					
					 The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK regulates the state and all other activities with the great Juche idea and the Songun idea as the guidelines.
					
					 The Juche idea and the Songun idea authored by President Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK and father of socialist Korea, and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il are the ideological and theoretical guidelines for realizing the popular masses' independence.
					
					 The Juche idea takes it as the basic idea to realize the popular masses' independence.
					
					 The Songun idea based on the Juche idea chiefly aims to defend the popular masses' independence from challenge and threat of the imperialists and dominationists.
					
					 The Socialist Constitution stipulates that the popular masses are the masters of everything and everything of society serves them.
					
					 The constitution defends the interests of the popular masses, the masters of state and society free from exploitation and oppression, and respects and protects human rights.
					
					 It also stipulates it as the highest principle of state activities to steadily improve the people's material and cultural life.
					
					 The DPRK is a tax-free country.
					
					 The increasing material wealth of society is being entirely directed to improving the well-being of the working people under the condition in which the social sources of exploitation and poverty are totally removed and there is no tax.
					
					 In actuality, the DPRK defends the independent requirements and interests of the working people and provides them with all conditions with the mission as a householder responsible for their life.
					
					 The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK is a driving force dynamically advancing the revolution and construction as it enjoys the absolute support from the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Praised by Figures of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Praised by Figures of DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- The director of the Cedi Publishing House of the DR Congo said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work carrying valuable definitions of patriotism and the motherland, love and dedication will greatly contribute to instilling patriotism into the mind of the people of the DR Congo.
					 He said this at the ceremony of releasing Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism."
					
					 We deem it an honor to publish the work of Kim Jong Un, the great leader of the Korean people, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Reflected in the work is the noble moral sense of obligation of Kim Jong Un who regards it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the cause of leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated all his life to the country and its people.
					
					 We will as ever publish lots of his works.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo said that Kim Jong Un's work serves as a precious textbook instilling into the mind of not only the Korean people but also the people of the DR Congo the immutable truth that a genuine patriot should live not merely for today but for tomorrow.
					
					  The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the DR Congo and the section chief of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, International Cooperation and Francophone Affairs of the DR Congo underlined the need to learn from the experience of the DPRK bringing about a great surge in building a prosperous country under Kim Jong Un's leadership.
